body.name: Mount Plus MP-06-02 Cable Box Mount, Modem Mount | Adjustable Wall Mount for Small and Wide Devices | Media Players, Cable Boxes, Modems, DVD Players | Game Console Such As PS3, PS4, Xbox One S (Wide)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 42 mins
features: ADJUSTABLE WALL MOUNT: Check the dimensions of your device to see if it will fit with our adjustable wall mount - Vertical Height: Maximum 10" (no minimum), Vertical Length: 3.5"-10", Vertical Depth: 1.85" to 2.99"

EASY INSTALLATION: You’ll be able to install this wall mount quickly and easily - includes dry wall screws and anchors. After installing the bracket, simply tighten the bracket until your device is secure!
TAME THE CABLE MONSTER: Hide your wires and boxes to enjoy a clean, organized TV setup. Our wall mount is perfect to pair with a mounted TV - just mount the device behind your TV!

DOES NOT INTERFERE WITH REMOTE CONTROLS: Don't worry about your signal from your remote control being blocked! Infrared Signals remotes, Radio Frequency remotes, and Bluetooth remotes will still work with the device behind the TV - you can test your device by holding it behind a TV and having a friend try the remote.

It is perfect for Apple TV (4th Generation), Amazon Fire, Roku and many other popular media players, PS3, PS4, Xbox One, AT&T U-verse boxes, Comcast Xfinity Set boxes, Nintendo Wii, Select Roku Devices, Samsung Blu-Ray Players, Toshiba Players, Charter Spectrum boxes, HP Pavilion Mini, Verizon Fios Boxes, Directv Receivers, Dish DVRs, Swann NVR boxes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Small Device Wall Mount (Wide) for Cable Boxes, Modems, DVD Players, Game Consoles and Streaming Media Devices The mount features the easiest way to have a clean and versatile setup to media players.The adjustable design is compatible with a wide range of media players, cable and satellite boxes.It is perfect for Apple TV (4th Generation), Amazon Fire, Roku and many other popular media players.It can be used for game console such PS3, PS4, Xbox One S, Wii, Nintendo switch (Not ALL GAME CONSOLES WILL FIT)AT&T U-verse boxes, Comcast Xfinity Set boxes, Nintendo Wii, Select Roku Devices, Samsung Blu-Ray Players, Toshiba Players, Charter Spectrum boxes, HP Pavilion Mini, Verizon Fios Boxes, Directv Receivers, Dish DVRs, Swann NVR boxes, Sonos port, and many more small deviceThe wall mounting option frees up more space on your tabletop.Open construction provides easy access to power button, output jacks, and cables on either side.No more concern about the spilling of your media box, the elastic cord firmly holds your equipment WALL MOUNT IS COMPATIBLE WITH CABLE BOXES, WIRELESS ROUTERS, MODEMS + OTHER ELECTRONIC DEVICES INCLUDING: Apple: Mac mini Intel Core and Intel Core 2 Duo 2006-2009, PowerPC G4 2005; Asus: O!Play HD Media Player; AT&T U-verse: Scientific Atlanta IPN330HD, VIP2200, VIP2250; Cisco Scientific Atlanta: IPN330HD, VIP2200, VIP2250; ClickShare CSE-200; Comcast: XFinity Motorola RNG 150N, X1 Pace PR150BNM; DirecTV: D12-100, D12-300, D12-500, D12-700; Gefen: GefenTV gtv-hd-pvr; HP: Pavillion Mini 200-010 / 300-20 / 300-30; Motorola: Arris SURFboard SB6141 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem; Motorola RNG 150N; Nintendo: Wii 2006-current; Roku: First Generation, 2008-2010, DVP, SD N1050, HD N1000/N1100, HD-CXR N1101; Samsung: BD-ES6000 Blu-Ray Player; Slingbox: SB350-100; Sony: DMEX DMXDVD Bravia DVD Link; Toshiba: BDX6400 Blu-ray DVD Player; BDX5500 / BDX3500; Yamaha WXA-50 Wireless Streaming Amp; Zotac MAGNUS EN1070 + MORE!

Compatibility Information (WIDE VERSION) This adjustable wall mount is custom designed to fit the following dimensions: Vertical Height: Maximum of 10" (no minimum)Width: 5"Depth: 1.85" to 2.99" ( 47mm to 76mm) WIDE VERSIONWeight Support: 11 LBSThe elastic cord firmly holds your equipment.

Adjustable Depth Adjustable to fit a wide range of media players, cable and satellite boxs. The support range is from 1.85" to 2.99" (Wide Version) Open Construction Open construction provide easy access to power button, output jacks and cable on either side Adjustable Knobs Adjustable knobs to allow you to easily adjust depth of mount Easy Installation 4 mounting holes for quick and easy Installation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install and hides behind our tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly to mount control unit (Samsung Frame TV) or cable box under the sound bar for my LCD TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Sturdy. And great for hiding your new game console behing the TV from the Mrs or your Mom
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. But don't try that at home. I can confidently say this is a very sturdy mount. It's probably overkill for my cable modem. The adjustable width is a great feature. Watch my video. As you can see my modem barely fits. I didn't realize the flare at the bottom. But that's on me. If you have a stud in the perfect mounting place, I believe this can support some heavy stuff. My modem is around a pound (0.45 Kilograms for Y'all metric folks), therfore I used the included hardware. I gave it a tug or two. The hardware holds. I probably should have videoed that part, but I didn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: bf seemed to install it quick but doesn't seem too sturdy. Gets the job done, worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to mount my PS3 to the wall and it worked out as planned. PS3 fit like a glove and I had no issued mounting this unit to the wall. I actually mounted it right above the tv wall mount, so it is directly in the wall stud. I was able to tighten the screws enough to where I didn't need to use the rubber band that came with it to secure my PS3. Good item, I will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it, does the job. I got it to hold out external memory for our xbox.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, but wish bungee band it comes with secured devices better.
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to install. Can be done in 10-15 minutes. I would rate this product a little better if the bungee strap that it comes with secured your device better. It does hold, but it comes loose from the mounting edges to easy. Its basically a light bungee band that anchors to the ends of the mount via 2 small metal hooks. The hooks are too small to reliably hold the bungee in place. If your device gets pushed to far to one side the bungee pops off the hook and there goes your device. Also, the rubber bungee is kind of small and barely wrapped around my small LG blu-ray player. If you have a wide device the bungee will not work. I don't think the bungee is even long enough to wrap around a PS3. This could me your device may fall to the ground if your not careful. The adjustable depth plate works well, but it's not enough to hold your device secure. If you push your device to earthier side without the bungee it will most likely fall off unless you have it sandwiched really tight between the adjustable bracket plate. I will have to see if my blu ray player does not fall.At the end I am OK with the product since I only have a small cheap blu ray player. I would not trust this product with any expensive device like a PlayStation or X-Box etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Mount, Easy Peasy
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what it says, perfect for vertical single mount stud in limited spaces. Very satisfied.
Facile a installer et pas trop gros
I really like this product. Awesome for hiding your cable box.
